chart.title: When will countries phase out coal power?
chart.subtitle: This measures pledges to phase out coal from the electricity mix.
chart.note: Where a concrete phase out date is not defined, we have allocated the final year of the target decade. For example, "Phase out in the 2040s" is given a target date of 2049.
chart.citation: Powering Past Coal Alliance; Ember; Beyond Coal EU; Bloomberg Coal Countdown and other sources
